This game is amazing!!!

If you want to experience an oldschool counter strike experience, but with more modern graphics, this is the game for you. High quality servers (especially the gungame turbo one) means that there is a healthy and active community. Plenty of blyats and rush bs everywhere. Truly, a game worth your money.

Uno de los Mejores CS uwu

Best goddamn CS out there, looks amazing, the gameplay is original and stayed true to the series and the game is just great. There really isn't anything else to say other than a question - Why the fuck do people prefer CS:GO over this game? Some say that it's old, some say it """""looks bad""""", but I know the reason. The reason is that there are no skins, knives or any bullshit like that here, if you want it - just download it, it's free. You don't have to pay horrendous amounts of money for a couple of pixels.
